KiyohimeMod:ExtraAttack.NAME: Extra Attack
KiyohimeMod:ExtraAttack.DESCRIPTION: Unobtainable. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.Damage and hit count varies depending on current Spirit Origin.Card color is determined by the first attack you played this turn.

KiyohimeMod:Track.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Vulnerable ,and gain 1 Strength to it !M! turn.
